projects.title: Making Financial Inclusion Sustainable
projects.bodyText:
- • Collaboration with Finance Professionals: Worked with experienced finance professionals and learned from them, gaining valuable insights into the industry.
• Customer Service Point Visits: Visited different customer service points to observe and understand how they operate, and to identify areas for improvement.
• Financial Inclusion Knowledge: Learned about Financial Inclusion and its importance in providing access to banking services for people who are underserved or excluded from traditional banking systems.
• Practical Experience: Gained hands-on experience in the finance industry, combining theoretical knowledge with practical skills and understanding of real-world applications.

projects.title: Investment Analysis and Portfolio Allotment with Data Analysis and Graphical Representation
projects.bodyText:
-  •	Portfolio Performance: The portfolio has shown a positive return on investment (ROI) of 26.27%, with the Banking sector leading the returns at 33.86%.
•	Sector-wise Performance: The FMCG sector has a return of 30.35%, with Varun Beverages being the top performer. The IT sector has a return of 14.59%, with HCL Technologies being the average performer and Tech Mahindra being the low performer.
•	Key Recommendations: Continue to diversify investments across sectors, monitor individual stock performance, consider investing in stocks with strong fundamental factors, and use technical analysis indicators to optimize entry and exit points.
•	Key Takeaways: The portfolio analysis provides valuable insights into the performance, worth, and optimal entry points of each stock, and the Power BI report presents a clear and concise summary of the portfolio analysis..

projects.title: Quiet Hours App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that **automatically silences** your phone during class hours, designed for **VITians**.
 - Option to select class **slots** and **custom time**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.

projects.title: Secure Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to send texts in real time.
 - End to End encryption using **RSA** Algorithm.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - Secured with **Fingerprint** lock.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
